import React, {useState} from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import APIService from "./components/APIService"; export default function (props) { let [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("signin") let [name, setName] = useState('') let [username, setUsername] = useState('') let [email, setEmail] = useState('') let [password, setPassword] = useState('') let [UserOrEmail, setUserOrEmail] = useState('') let [error, setError] = useState(null) let foundUser; const insertUser = () => { APIService.InsertUser({name, username, email, password}) .then((response) => console.log(response)) .catch(error => console.log('Error while creating user ', username)) } const getUser = () => { APIService.GetUser({UserOrEmail, password}) .then((response) =>foundUser = response) .catch(error => console.log(error, UserOrEmail)) } const handleSignUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() insertUser() setName('') setUsername('') setEmail('') setPassword('') } const handleSignIn = (event) => { event.preventDefault() setUserOrEmail('') setPassword('') console.log(foundUser) } const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "signin" ? "signup" : "signin") } if (authMode === "signin") { return (
